title: How does a blanket keep us warm on a cold night? - Quora

response.answer_text: Our bodies are always giving off heat, even during sleep. A blanket traps the heat and keeps it close to our bodies keeping us warm. The earth does the same thing with clouds. A cloudy night traps the heat from the day keeping nighttime temperatures up. While a cloudless night the heat dissapates and creates a colder night.
